content: this gorgeous yelena scarf has a gorgeous texture and color gradient this pattern is one of the june contributions to the 2025 scarf of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 333 yds of a category 3 light weight yarn i used hobbi carnival in the trinidad 03 colorway * size h 5mm furls streamline crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
